dialog.title: dialog
dialog.description: Formatting supported with & and ยง, and @S becomes the player's name

text.title: text
text.description: Text spoken by NPC. '[Name] ' part is handled by the plugin

raw_text.title: raw_text
raw_text.description: No name or formatting included by default

clickable_text.title: clickable_text
clickable_text.description: Colored, formatted, and put in [] for you.

prerequisites.description: The prerequisites required for the player to SEE this option. If they do not meet them, this text will not be shown.

player_valid_radius.description: Range that the player is allowed to walk from the point where they were shown the message and still have the dialog work. Default is 4.0.

set_scores.title: set_scores
set_scores.description: Set the player's specified scoreboard value(s). Click Properties, then type in the scoreboard name in the input box and click the 'add' button. Scoreboards are case-sensitive

set_questdata.title: set_questdata
set_questdata.description: Set the player's specified Quest Data values(s). Click Properties, then type in the Quest Data ID in the input box and click the 'add' button. Quest Data IDs are case-sensitive

.*.description: Sets the Quest Data field for the Quest Data ID. Adding a + to the beginning will add to the score. Adding a - to the beginning will subtract from the score.

trade.title: trade
trade.description: Opens an RPG Trade for the player to use.

menu.title: menu
menu.description: Opens a Menu for the player to use. Valid arguments: reforges.

function.title: function
function.description: Runs a function via the console as the player (/execute as <playername> at @s run function <function>)

command.title: command
command.description: Runs a command via the console. Any instance of '@S' (uppercase!) will be replaced with the player's name. Any instance of '@N' (uppercase!) will be replaced with the NPC's UUID, which can be used like @e to target a specific entity. The NPC must be selected by trading or punching to use the entity UUID, or the player will receive an error instead.

give_loot.title: give_loot
give_loot.description: Gives the player all items from a loot table.

give_reward.title: give_reward
give_reward.description: Rewards the player all of the items from given loot tables in a stylized UI.

base_reward.title: base_reward
base_reward.description: The loot table that is given to the player as the base.

pick_reward.title: pick_reward
pick_reward.description: The loot table that contains the loot from which the player has to pick 1 item from. This can be left blank if not intended.

xp.title: xp
xp.description: The amount of experience given to the player.

coins.title: coins
coins.description: The amount of coins given to the player.

give_xp.title: give_xp
give_xp.description: Gives the player the amount of XP specified.

interact_npc.title: interact_npc
interact_npc.description: Triggers a follow-on interaction with a different NPC.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the NPC to have the player interact with.

entity_type.title: entity_type
entity_type.description: EntityType of the NPC to have the player interact with (default is VILLAGER).

voice_over.title: voice_over
voice_over.description: Play a sound to the player as an NPC (WIP)

rerun_components.title: rerun_components
rerun_components.description: Re-runs all quest components tied to this specific NPC (including those specified in other files). To prevent infinite loops, this action will not run itself, even if conditions indicate it should.
